# numberOfSections

**Instance Property**

The number of sections in the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfSections: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the number of sections reported by the data source object. If the collection view does not use a data source object, the value in this property is `1`.

## Getting the State of the Collection View

- **numberOfItems(inSection:)**: Returns the number of items in the specified section.

items.description: Returns the number of items in the specified section.
items.name: numberOfItems(inSection:)
